duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed association travel room night and revenue goals
Determine quality and profitability of business
Qualify and follow through on all leads
Update all accounts with current General Manager, Presidents, CEO’s, VP’s of Sales & Marketing for direct mail campaigns
Effectively create and implement a profitable association sales and service strategy on a regular basis

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required, college degree preferred, 3+ years hotel industry selling experience required, multi-territory or National sales experience required
